name: Power Defence (LePatouPolaire)
description:
Power Defence is a strategy / tower defence game where you link towers on a circuit board to prevent enemies from reaching your Core!

Try to get the highest score. Self-improvement is the way to win!

**The Replay button currently closes the game instead of reloading the scene. Our bad! 

Made by : Edouard  "LePatouPolaire" R.  // Martin "Martoblob" S. 

Musi by : Maya Messaoudi
